name: Magic Mirror (ScriptLine Studios)
description:
Mr Fredrick's garden has been invaded by monsters!

Use your special ability's to defeat the monsters and destroy the magic mirror's where they came from!

W,A,D - Movement

Right Click - Freeze time

Left Click - Unfreeze time

Arrow Keys - Scroll through Attacks (Only available when time is frozen)

Enter - Confirm attack and unfreeze time

This game was made in 1 week for the Weekly Game Jam Week 148    

#WeeklyGameJam #WGJ #WGJGame
